item.title: Runescapes New "Right Click" Context Menus My way with Correct Colors
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:145, topic:288337”][quote author=Tonic link=topic=381208.msg3068878#msg3068878 date=1261409993]

/showthread.php?t=155473

? Don’t advertise.
[/quote]
I don’t see a link to a forum?

/showthread.php?t=155473

LMAO, trying to say he leeched code, thats renamed, one way or another it could have been leeched, yes, but that is renamed, this is non. Please, dont say something is stolen, when its not even the same type of code.

It’s exactly the same code you idiot, except he changed var and method names therefore it isn’t his, which is leeching. Since when does changing variables and method names make the code yours? Oh, it doesn’t.
Your argument is invalid.[/quote]

Your invalid you dumbfuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescapes New "Right Click" Context Menus My way with Correct Colors
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:145, topic:288337”][quote author=Tonic link=topic=381208.msg3068878#msg3068878 date=1261409993]

/showthread.php?t=155473

? Don’t advertise.
[/quote]
I don’t see a link to a forum?

/showthread.php?t=155473

LMAO, trying to say he leeched code, thats renamed, one way or another it could have been leeched, yes, but that is renamed, this is non. Please, dont say something is stolen, when its not even the same type of code.

It’s exactly the same code you idiot, except he changed var and method names therefore it isn’t his, which is leeching. Since when dpes changing variables and method names make the code yours? Oh, it doesn’t.
Your argument is invalid.[/quote]
Leeching goes back to the word leech. A leech is an animal which sucks blood. Not a human being who takes code and changes ‘var’ and method names. You mean stealing. Therefore, your argument is invalid.

item.title: Runescapes New "Right Click" Context Menus My way with Correct Colors
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“T3arful, post:139, topic:288337”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=381208.msg3066262#msg3066262 date=1261246200]
So?
The client section sucks here, and always has really, most of the good stuff comes from Miss Silab, or from people from Rune Server, if some leeched stuff wasn’t posted here then the section would be practically empty.

Fine, if you post a link with an exact word-for-word post, then yeah, I’ll close it, if not, it doesn’t bother me much.
Leeching rule is only really strictly enforced for the downloads section.
[/quote]
And how does that give someone the right to take somebodies work and claim it as their own? If a family is poor it doesn’t give them the right to steal from other people, it’s the same principle really.[/quote]

I guess so.
Somebody get me the link.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescapes New "Right Click" Context Menus My way with Correct Colors

The client section sucks here, and always has really, most of the good stuff comes from Miss Silab, or from people from Rune Server, if some leeched stuff wasn’t posted here then the section would be practically empty.

Fine, if you post a link with an exact word-for-word post, then yeah, I’ll close it, if not, it doesn’t bother me much.
Leeching rule is only really strictly enforced for the downloads section.[/quote]
And how does that give someone the right to take somebodies work and claim it as their own? If a family is poor it doesn’t give them the right to steal from other people, it’s the same principle really.
All he has done is taken .Jack’s context menu post from Rune Server and un-renamed, changing vars and method names hardly accounts for not leeching.

Tonic:

Yup, and it’s so hard to change colors people.

It quite obviously is for you since you take all of your shit from Rune Server, who the fuck are you kidding with “I’m only on Mopar”.
